wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Henry Devereux Berridge (6 July 1857 – 24 October 1924) was a British Liberal politician and solicitor.

response: * Thomas Berridge, Liberal MP from 1906–10 for Warwick and Leamington (his father was a former headmaster)
*Sir Thomas Berridge, solicitor and Liberal candidate.
*Thomas Berridge (1857–1924), British Liberal politician and solicitor
